snippet: Africa Israel Properties and Developments USA will retain an ownership stake in the Upper West Side building, but the condo board and sales sponsor will be managed by another investor.
abstract: Apthorp apartment building on Manhattan's Upper West Side, one of the city's most troubled condominium conversions, undergoes yet another change; Africa Israel Properties and Developments USA, one of the project's largest investors, relinquishes control of the project; maintaining an ownership stake but turning over control of the condo board and sales sponsor to Arefin Investments.
lead_paragraph: Africa Israel Properties and Developments USA will retain an ownership stake in the Upper West Side building, but the condo board and sales sponsor will be managed by another investor.

headline.seo: A Major Investor in Apthorp Cedes Day-to-Day Control
headline.main: Major Investor in the Apthorp Cedes Its Day-to-Day Control
headline.print_headline: Major Investor in the Apthorp Cedes Its Day-to-Day Control
